feed.title: BookLore Releases

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.35
entry.content:
🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Extract and set the series name and index for EPUBs (#69) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Remove unnecessary comments from docker compose (#68) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add missing mariadb creds (#66) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.39
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Implement cover size selection and regeneration (#80) by @adityachandelgit

⚙️ CI/CD

  • Automatically delete all remote branches that have been merged into m… (#82) by @adityachandelgit
